message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $170, which I believe is a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to pay more than $100 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
